alert.note: Alert for Clackamas; Marion (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 08 at 12:59AM PST until January 09 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Oregon...Washington... Tualatin River near Dilley affecting Washington County. Cowlitz River at Kelso affecting Cowlitz County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oregon... Washington... Luckiamute River near Suver affecting Polk and Benton Counties. Nehalem River near Foss affecting Tillamook and Clatsop Counties. Grays River near Rosburg affecting Wahkiakum County. Pudding River at Aurora affecting Clackamas and Marion Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pudding River at Aurora. * WHEN...From late tonight to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...Above 22.0 feet, expect minor flooding of low-lying agricultural lands and access roads along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 AM PST Saturday the stage was 21.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 22.0 feet late tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued later this morning.
